## Now let's generate some data visualizations:
```{r}
uniqueUsersOverTime <- df %>%
  group_by(user) %>%
  slice_min(timestamp) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(user, timestamp) %>%
  mutate(hour = round_date(as_datetime(timestamp), unit = "hour")) %>%
  group_by(hour) %>%
  mutate(numNewUsers = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(timestamp) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  mutate(totalUsers = cumsum(numNewUsers))

uniqueUsersPlot <- ggplot(uniqueUsersOverTime, aes(hour, totalUsers)) +
  geom_line() + xlab("Date") + ylab("Unique AAVE Users") + ggtitle("How Has the Number of AAVE Users Grown Over Time?")

uniqueUsersPlot
```
